mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.book_deduction_item_sid, t.book_deduction_sid, t.item_num, t.deduction_type, t.currency_amount_tax_kk, t.currency_amount_tax_hxz, t2.currency_amount_tax_yhx, t2.currency_amount_tax_dhx, t.refer_doc_category, t.refer_doc_sid, t.refer_doc_code, t.refer_doc_item_sid, t.refer_doc_item_code, t.tax_rate, t.clear_status, t.account_valid_date, t.new_receivable_use_date, t.remark, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, t3.document_date, t3.sale_person, u1.nick_name as sale_person_name, t4.product_season_name from s_fin_book_customer_deduction_item t left join s_fin_book_customer_deduction t1 on t.book_deduction_sid = t1.book_deduction_sid LEFT JOIN () t2 ON t.book_deduction_item_sid = t2.book_deduction_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_fin_customer_deduction_bill t3 on t.refer_doc_sid = t3.deduction_bill_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t4 on t3.product_season_sid = t4.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 on t3.sale_person = u1.user_name

SELECT t.book_deduction_item_sid, t.book_deduction_sid, t.currency_amount_tax_kk, t1.book_source_category, IFNULL(t2.currency_amount_tax_kouk, 0) as currency_amount_tax_yhx, (t.currency_amount_tax_kk - IFNULL(t3.currency_amount_tax_kouk, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_dhx FROM s_fin_book_customer_deduction_item t LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_customer_deduction t1 ON t.book_deduction_sid = t1.book_deduction_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i1.book_deduction_sid, SUM(i1.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax_kouk FROM s_fin_receivable_bill_item_koukuan i1 LEFT JOIN s_fin_receivable_bill i2 ON i1.receivable_bill_sid = i2.receivable_bill_sid WHERE i2.handle_status = '5' GROUP BY i1.book_deduction_sid ) t2 ON t.book_deduction_sid = t2.book_deduction_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i1.book_deduction_sid, SUM(i1.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax_kouk FROM s_fin_receivable_bill_item_koukuan i1 LEFT JOIN s_fin_receivable_bill i2 ON i1.receivable_bill_sid = i2.receivable_bill_sid WHERE i2.handle_status = '5' OR i2.handle_status = '3' GROUP BY i1.book_deduction_sid ) t3 ON t.book_deduction_sid = t3.book_deduction_sid
